data.comment: The match is underway. Utrecht have kicked-off.
Eindhoven take a 1-0 lead thanks to Donyell Malen.
In the minute 31, Mario Gotze with an assist there.
Mohammed Ihattaren puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 2-0.
Donyell Malen instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The ref has blown to start the second-half. Eindhoven kick-off.
Justin Hoogma for Utrecht has been booked by Serdar Gozubuyuk and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 56, Jorrit Hendrix is on a sub for Mario Gotze for Eindhoven.
Rene Hake is making the team's first substitution at Philips Stadion with Mimoun Mahi replacing Eljero Elia.
Utrecht make their second substitution with Moussa Sylla replacing Simon Gustafson.
In the minute 69, Yorbe Vertessen is replacing Mohammed Ihattaren for Eindhoven at Philips Stadion.
Goal! Mimoun Mahi pulls one back for Utrecht to make it 2-1.
Eindhoven's Denzel Dumfries has been booked in Eindhoven.
In the minute 78, The home team have replaced Donyell Malen with Joel Piroe. This is the third substitution made today by Roger Schmidt.
Nick Viergever is replacing Philipp Max for the home team.
Rene Hake (Utrecht) has taken off Emil Bergstrom who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Othman Boussaid is the replacement.
The match has come to a close in Eindhoven. The final score is 2-1.
